actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to improve the security of U.S. bases in the Philippines.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that pending the resolution of the political and military instabilities in the Philippines: (1) the United States should eliminate all new investment for the construction and improvement of military installations in that country, with the exception of funds for basic operations, maintenance, and security of equipment and personnel; and (2) the Department of Defense should increase investment in alternative military installations in the Pacific and improve security of civilian and military personnel at Clark and Subic military bases.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to improve the security of U.S. bases in the Philippines.
